alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 17 at 3:21PM PDT until August 17 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 520 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following county, Riverside. * WHEN...Until 520 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 321 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert and Santa Rosa Mountain. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
